'''Qasimi''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in {{Quest|Wealthy Merchant}}.

==Profile==
He is one of [[Dori]]'s business partners, whom Dori introduces Kaveh and the [[Traveler]] to in order to secure funding for the construction of [[Badawi]]'s library.

===Etymology===
* Qasimi may be a reference to {{Lang|Kasim|ar=قاسم|ar_rm=Qāsim}} from ''{{w|One Thousand and One Nights}}'', the rich and greedy merchant brother of the poor {{w|Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves|Ali Baba}}.
